page.title: 11A day in the life of ....
page.content: I get up between 7:55am and 8:00am,I don't want to get put of my cosy bed in the morning but as I go downstairs that feeling disappears.I have my breakfast,Weetabix and toast,by 8:20am.I hate the rush before school.We always seem to be late, however early we are.I walk of to school at about 8:47am and reach there at about 8:55am.The whistle goes at 9:00am.When we get into the class we often do english untl assembly at 10:05am.At 10:30 we have first play which lasts twenty minutes.Then we go into our mathematics groups and work from S.M.P.G. until 11:58am.After we have our lunch(I have School dinners but most people have sandwiches)we have "dinner"play which lasts until 1:15pm.I like lunch but I have mixed feelings on dinner play which can be tiresome.
